      • octoStatus

        public static void octoStatus()
        Prints all the hand tools and the name in the following format. ------------------- Name:[name] | 0:[tool0] | 1:[tool1] | 2:[tool2] | 3:[tool3] | 4:[tool4] | 5:[tool5] | 6:[tool6] | 7:[tool7] | -------------------
